column4: It‚Äôs urgent that Congress deliver comprehensive relief to small businesses struggling to survive the pandemic. We also have to ensure that ongoing recovery efforts reach underserved communities.

Judge Barrett could be the deciding vote to strip health care away from millions.

Instead of doing what we should be doing, which is negotiating a final COVID-19 relief package for the American people, the Senate Majority is racing ahead with a Supreme Court confirmation. #WhatsAtStake
